title: Creative Strategist
description:
CreativePulse Agency is Hiring a Creative Strategist (Full-Time)

CreativePulse Agency, a Shanghai-based firm, crafts campaigns for clients in tech and lifestyle. We’re seeking an Creative Strategist to develop innovative strategies.

Role Summary
You’ll create campaign strategies that engage audiences.

Key Duties
- Conduct market research.
- Develop campaign concepts.
- Collaborate for content creation.
- Analyze campaign performance.
- Present strategies to clients.
- Create messaging frameworks.
- Stay updated on creative trends.
- Support client meetings.
- Contribute to brand audits.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in creative strategy, with strong research and campaign development skills. Excellent communication and creativity are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing or a related field is required.

Why CreativePulse?
We value creativity and innovation. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a dynamic environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Performance bonuses
20 days of annual leave
Training budget
Creative tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join CreativePulse Agency to shape creative campaigns. Submit your application today!
